Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hello,

I'm trying to add seed urls to a job, mid crawl, in Heritrix 3.  I saw this
wiki article:
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Adding+URIs+mid-crawl  but
it doesn't seem to apply to H3.

It looks like JMX isn't being used anymore, so I was wondering what method
should be used now in its place?

Thanks,
Greg

--001636c5c2a4cbd7db0483808181
